title: #137: Ted Kaczynski with The Grimerica Show
description:
Thank you for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome back returning champions from the Grimerica Show, Darren Grimes and Graham Dunlop to discuss Ted Kaczynski aka the Unabomber. We then analyze the Unabomber Manifesto: Industry Society and It's Future to see how accurate he was with his predictions. You will be shocked by how accurate it actually was. Full disclosure I was still jacked on 7/11 coffee. Thank you so much for all of you support.
Please check out our sponsor BETDSI.com and use the promo code HAT100 for some special promotion exclusively fo our Tin Foil Hat listeners.
